name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】3D新衣装お披露目!! 兎田ぺこら生誕祭ライブ♪【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [jgoJuJiWtf4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Chikyuu Saigo no Kokuhaku o' by Usada Pekora and Tokino Sora.
Performance of 'Sugar Song to Bitter Step' by Usada Pekora, Shiranui Flare, Houshou Marine, and Shirogane Noel.

subtitles.original: 恋なんて呼ぶには 穢れすぎてしまったね
subtitles.english: To call it love, it's become far too defiled.

subtitles.original: そして 時間が流れて 世界が灰になったとて
subtitles.english: And as time passes, even if the world turns to ash,

subtitles.original: 僕は今でも 不意に君を思い出すんだ
subtitles.english: Even now, I suddenly find myself remembering you.

subtitles.original: 誰もいない 枯れた世界で
subtitles.english: In a withered world where no one else remains,

subtitles.original: 悪戯の意味を知ったよ
subtitles.english: I learned the meaning of a prank.

subtitles.original: 臆病でも 今なら言えるんだ
subtitles.english: Even if I'm a coward, I can say it now.

subtitles.original: 地球最後 この告白を
subtitles.english: This confession at the end of the Earth.

subtitles.original: いつか見た夕焼けは あんなに綺麗だったのに
subtitles.english: The sunset I once saw was so beautiful, and yet...

subtitles.original: 恋なんて呼ぶには 遠回りしすぎたよ
subtitles.english: To call it love, I've taken too long a detour.

subtitles.original: そして 何もかもが 手遅れの灰になったとて
subtitles.english: And even if everything has turned into too-late ashes,

subtitles.original: 僕は今さら 君が好きだって
subtitles.english: Even at this late hour, that I love you...

subtitles.original: 君が好きだったと言え...
subtitles.english: That I loved you, I can't even say...

subtitles.original:
シュガーソングとビターステップ
作詞・作曲 田淵智也
subtitles.english:
Sugar Song to Bitter Step
Lyrics & Composition: Tomoya Tabuchi

subtitles.original: 超天変地異みたいな狂騒にも慣れて
subtitles.english: Getting used to the uproar like a massive cataclysm,

subtitles.original: こんな日常を平和と見間違える
subtitles.english: I mistake such a daily life for peace.

subtitles.original: rambling coaster 揺さぶられながら
subtitles.english: While being shaken by a rambling coaster,

subtitles.original: 見失えないものは何だ
subtitles.english: What is it that I cannot lose sight of?

subtitles.original: 平等性原理主義の概念に飲まれて
subtitles.english: Swallowed up by the concept of equality fundamentalism,

subtitles.original: 心までがまるでエトセトラ
subtitles.english: Even my heart is like just another "et cetera."

subtitles.original: 大嫌い 大好き ちゃんと喋らなきゃ
subtitles.english: Hate it, love it, if I don't speak properly,

subtitles.original: 人形とさして変わらないし
subtitles.english: I'm not much different from a doll.

subtitles.original: ああ 宵街を行く人だかりは
subtitles.english: Ah, the crowds walking through the evening streets,

subtitles.original: 嬉しそうだったり 寂しそうだったり
subtitles.english: They look happy, or they look lonely.

subtitles.original: コントラストが五線譜を飛び回り
subtitles.english: Contrast flies around the musical staff,

subtitles.original: 歌とリズムになる
subtitles.english: Becoming song and rhythm.

subtitles.original: ママレード＆シュガーソング ピーナッツ＆ビターステップ
subtitles.english: Marmalade & Sugar Song, Peanuts & Bitter Step,

subtitles.original: 甘くて苦くて目が回りそうです
subtitles.english: It's sweet and bitter, making my head spin.

subtitles.original: 南南西を目指してパーティを続けよう
subtitles.english: Let's keep the party going toward the south-southwest,

subtitles.original: 世界中を驚かせてしまう夜になる
subtitles.english: It'll be a night that surprises the whole world.

subtitles.original: I feel 上々 連鎖になってリフレクト
subtitles.english: I feel great, becoming a chain and reflecting.

subtitles.original: 蓋然性合理主義の正体にもまれて
subtitles.english: Buffeted by the true nature of probability rationalism,

subtitles.original: 僕らの音楽は道具に成り下がる？
subtitles.english: Will our music degenerate into a mere tool?

subtitles.original: こっちを向いてよ 背を向けないでよ
subtitles.english: Look at me, don't turn your back on me,

subtitles.original: それは正論にならないけど
subtitles.english: Though that doesn't make for a sound argument.

subtitles.original: 祭囃子のそのあとで
subtitles.english: After the festival music has ended,

subtitles.original: 高ぶったままの人 泣き出してしまう人
subtitles.english: Some remain excited, others start to cry.

subtitles.original: 多分同じだろう でも言葉にしようものなら
subtitles.english: It's probably the same, but if I try to put it into words,

subtitles.original: 稚拙が極まれり
subtitles.english: It would be the height of clumsiness.

subtitles.original: 最高だってシュガーソング 幸せってビターステップ
subtitles.english: The best sugar song, happiness bitter step,

subtitles.original: 死ねない理由をそこに映し出せ
subtitles.english: Reflect the reasons for not dying right there.

subtitles.original: 惜しがったって等速度で明日は来ちゃうけど
subtitles.english: Even if we regret it, tomorrow will arrive at a constant speed,

subtitles.original: 脳内天気予報のアップデートは果たしたなら
subtitles.english: But if you've finished updating the weather forecast in your mind...
